mapper.select: SELECT lkvt.id AS lkvt_id, lkvt.`key` AS lkvt_key, lkvt.key_tag AS lkvt_key_tag, lkvt.value_end_tag AS lkvt_value_end_tag FROM log_collected_item lci, log_mid_collected_item_kv lmcik, log_kv_tag lkvt WHERE lmcik.collected_item_id = lci.id AND lmcik.kv_tag_id = lkvt.id AND lci.id = #{collectedItemId}
